subject: Add layout presets for quick start
body:
Add 6 layout presets (Hero, Left/Right/Top/Bottom Image, Text Focus)
to the Layout tab for faster ad creation. Presets configure split type,
image coverage, cell alignments, and text group placements.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Add layout presets for quick start
